What a Shopify chatbot is and why you should have one



A Shopify chatbot is a computer program that simulates and processes human conversation, embedded in a Shopify store. It can have multiple conversations at once, serving many customers instead of human agents. This is why chatbots for Shopify are very often used to automate customer support.



But that‚Äôs not even the best part‚Äî



Chatbots can also increase sales and improve user experience. As a matter of fact, customers tend to be happy with chatbot interactions. An average satisfaction rate of bot-only chats is almost 88%, which is 2% higher than satisfaction rates for chats that involve a human agent. This also explains why the usage of chatbots increased by a whopping 92% since 2019.

How to choose the best Shopify chatbot app?



Looking at the list, you might have noticed that all chatbot platforms offer unique features and capabilities. But when you decide to add a chatbot to Shopify, you need to focus on what‚Äôs the best for your ecommerce business. Here are a few tips that can help you select the best option.








Tip 1: Try to find the right ‚Äúvalue for price‚Äù balance. Before you add a chatbot to Shopify, you need to understand if the solution of your choice is within the budget range. However, don‚Äôt be biased by the price factor only. If a certain chatbot solution works better during the testing, but it‚Äôs only slightly more expensive compared to other options, it‚Äôs worth considering.¬†



Tip 2: See if it offers both ready-made chatbot templates and NLP-based chatbots. You will probably understand how easy it is to create template-based chatbots as soon as you start working with them. Consequently, you might want to develop something more complex and more effective as your business grows. Why not have more flexibility and start with a platform that offers both options?



Tip 3: Check for integrations that are essential for your business. What is the best chatbot for Shopify? The one that fits your technological stack. Always ask yourself about what your most common communication channels are. Do your customers write to you via SMS, Instagram, or Facebook Messenger? Do you need Slack integration? Check for these integrations beforehand.¬†



Tip 4: See if you can transfer chats to human agents. Even though people are getting used to the chatbot functionality, especially when it comes to online shopping assistance, 46% of consumers still think chatbots are used for stopping them from reaching a live agent. Having an option to transfer a customer to a human agent can be crucial, especially in the case of a more complex issue.



Tip 5: Check if it offers multichannel functionality. Switching tabs between email, live chat, and chatbot apps can become frustrating, to say the least. Solutions that offer Shopify chatbots often provide a multichannel dashboard, enabling you to connect all your channels to one dashboard. This will save you time and make the process of serving your customers more efficient.

Shopify chatbot: FAQ



Does Shopify have a chatbot? Shopify doesn‚Äôt provide a native solution for creating chatbots. Instead, you can easily integrate your Shopify store with a third-party chatbot development platform, like Tidio. This will enable you to easily create a Shopify chatbot.  How do I add a chatbot to Shopify? Log in to your Shopify account and select the store where you would like to install chatbots. Go to Apps>Visit Shopify store and search for ‚ÄúTidio‚Äù in the search bar. Select ‚ÄúTidio live chat‚Äù from the results and click on Add app. Click on the Install App button on the page that follows. It will send you to the Tidio panel. Now, go to the Chatbots section and choose a chatbot template, or create a new chatbot from scratch.  What is a Shopify chatbot? A Shopify chatbot enables ecommerce owners to use a computer program that simulates human interaction. Thanks to this functionality, they can automate customer support and answer repetitive questions on autopilot, as well as boost sales and increase conversion rates.  What is the best chat for Shopify? Tidio has quickly emerged as one of the best chatbot apps. The platform offers a dedicated integration for Shopify, which makes it extremely easy to add live chat and chatbots to your Shopify website.
